actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to remove the present limitation (of 25) on the number of Members who may jointly introduce a bill or resolution.

summary.text: Revises the Rules of the House of Representatives to remove the present limitation (of 25) on the number of Members who may jointly introduce a bill or resolution.

titles.title: Resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to remove the present limitation (of 25) on the number of Members who may jointly introduce a bill or resolution.
